title: Bronze 5 Support looking for players to climb with!
body:
Bronze 5 Support main but also a decent Top laner and ADC or jungler, silver 1 last season had a rough time this year tho, enjoy playing competitive and love to talk during a match using skype so i can make calls or plays/be directed if im not playing to a reasonable standard. Never flame never get salty and always keep my cool. if this interests you hmu in game but please dont be a raging salt monster. i play a lot during the day and at night as well

-ThreshXG

replies.body:
ADC main in Silver 3
I've got a hand full of players in an unofficial 'team' and I'm always looking for support mains. Add me if you're interested.

i main mid and top i can sup pretty good too am bronze 5 but was about to hit silver 5 last season here's my champ pool
{{champion:266}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:238}} so hit me up

Yea sure, love to have someone to climb with. I'm currently bronze 3 and have been having a rough time in ranked too. I'm a jungle main but I can also play top, mid and adc. I don't get very salty neither and rarely flame anybody. I think I got some pretty good game knowledge as well as I can shot call. I also love to talk during a match and I think it's crucial.

-Salyer
